GLM generator

Source: R/glm_generator.R
glm_generator.Rd

Takes a string of formulas and trains GLM models to output coefficients, diagnostic parameters and predicted values in a tibble.

glm_generator(x, data, family = gaussian)

Arguments

x

string of formulas
data

name of data object
family

define type of GLM required

Value

nested tibble

Examples

formulas <- c("mpg ~ hp", "mpg ~ cyl", "mpg ~ wt")
glm_generator(x = formulas, data = mtcars, family = gaussian)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 7
#>   formula   all       gla            tid            aug                bic     N
#>   <chr>     <list>    <list>         <list>         <list>           <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 mpg ~ hp  <S3: glm> <tibble [1 × … <tibble [2 × … <tibble [32 × 1…  186.    32
#> 2 mpg ~ cyl <S3: glm> <tibble [1 × … <tibble [2 × … <tibble [32 × 1…  174.    32
#> 3 mpg ~ wt  <S3: glm> <tibble [1 × … <tibble [2 × … <tibble [32 × 1…  170.    32
